com.stormpath.sdk.challenge

Interface Challenge<T extends Factor,R extends Enum>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - a subclass of Factor specifying the kind of Factor associated with this Challenge.
    R - a subclass of Enum specifying the status associated with this Challenge.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Auditable, Deletable, Resource, Saveable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    GoogleAuthenticatorChallenge, SmsChallenge

    public interface Challenge<T extends Factor,R extends Enum>
extends Resource, Saveable, Deletable, Auditable
    This domain object represents a challenge of a Factor for a Multi Factor Authentication.

    In a Multi Factor Authentication scenario authenticating a user is challenged by additional Factors like an SmsFactor. For Example: Using an SmsFactor as an additional Factor for authentication the user would receive an sms including a multi-digit code within its message. The user would verify the authentication challenge by entering the sms code back to the system.

    Since:
    1.1.0

      • validate

        boolean validate(String code)
        This is a convenience method to POST a code to an existing challenge resource in Stormpath for validation. Returns true in case the challenge is validated with the given code and false if otherwise.

        Immediate Execution: Unlike other Challenge methods, you do not need to call Saveable.save() getStatus() method will return the submission status in the event of a failure.

        Returns:
        true in case the challenge is validated with the given code.
